data.name: Hardworking Hero
data.detailed_description:
Adventurer! Money is everything, working hard and earning money!

Explore the map randomly in the lost world.

Random map events waiting to be resolved!

Work hard to make coins, and develop your character. Facing powerful mobs!

Failure is the mother of success. Use gold to upgrade your character.
Collect materials to upgrade equipment!

Create buildings to earn more money

Is the income increase too slow?
You need more buildings!

Save the villagers and they'll join your team.

Lost villagers are waiting for you to give them a home.

data.short_description: [Hardworking Hero] Is an exploratory idle game with pixel art. Earn the money by exploring maps and build buildings. Develop your adventurer to face powerful mobs. Don't forget, this game is about making money!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10（64-bit）
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11.2.2
  • Processor: Intel (64 Bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
